document_data.name: Trobriand's Glassee
document_data.mainbody: '''''Trobriand's glassee''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that made an object as transparent as glass.
document_data.Effects: The caster's skill determined the size of the object that could be affected. The effects of ''Trobriand's glassee'' were permanent once the spell was cast.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]] a sliver of glass to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was developed by [[Trobriand]] of [[Waterdeep]].
